artefact.overview: Use the online tool to report extremism or extremist content on the internet - your report will be treated anonymously
artefact.more_information:
Examples of extremism are:

- speeches or essays calling for racial or religious violence
- videos of violence with messages of praise for the attackers
- messages intended to stir up hatred against any religious or ethnic group
artefact.introduction: Use the online tool to report extremism or extremist content on the internet. Your report will be treated anonymously.
artefact.alternate_methods:
You can report extremist content online by [finding out which company hosts the website.](http://www.whoishostingthis.com "Find out which company hosts a website"){:rel="external"}

You can [contact your local police](http://www.police.uk "contact your local police"){:rel="external"} if you are concerned about extremism in your area.
